column1: Little Goat Diner////The place is perfect for groups because of the sheer size of the dining room
column2: just be sure to gauge your timing so you aren't showing up with 8 people at top traffic time. They also have a little bakery/bar next door that's great for waiting and drinking good beer if you happen to get stuck at dinner rush hour. Get drunk
column3: and all of sudden your table is ready. Yeehaw!
